title: Lucy Did It
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 52 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 100L
description: Rip! Crash! Plop! Who is making all that noise? Lucy Did It  provides the opportunity for students to investigate simple cause-and-effect relationships and retell the story. High-frequency words and repetitive phrases make this book perfect for beginning readers.
meta: clang, crash, ding, plop, rip, whoosh
Use the reading strategy of retelling to understand and remember story events
Cause and Effect : Identify cause and effect
Segment Onset and Rime : Segment onset and rime
Exclamation Marks : Identify and use exclamation point
Onomatopoeia : Recognize and understand the use of sound words (onomatopoeia)

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
